title: Rachel Reeves Plans Her Big Budget
summary: Rachel Reeves is the Chancellor, and she is getting ready to announce a big budget plan. A budget is like a plan for how the government will spend money. She has been working on this for months with her team. Her main goals are to make living costs lower, reduce waiting times in the NHS, and pay down the national debt. Some people in her party are worried, and others are skeptical that she can do it because there are many challenges, like high taxes and debt. The budget will be shared soon, and everyone is watching to see what happens.
